description: Reflects events that happen on GitHub in DevRev. This includes posting to timeline, updating status of issues and tickets, and creating autonomous issues from new branches and pull requests.

inputs_schema.description: Identify skills using PR changes and update the dev user with the identified skills.
inputs_schema.name: identify_skills

inputs_schema.description: Categorize issues based on PR and issue details.
inputs_schema.name: categorize_issues

inputs_schema.description: Store the summary of the Pull Request in the code_change object.
inputs_schema.name: summarize_pull_request

inputs_schema.description: Post feedback request on issue categorization.
inputs_schema.name: get_feedback_for_issue_categorization

ui.display_name: Post feedback request on issue categorization

inputs_schema.description: The number of calls to OpenAI API allowed per PR.
inputs_schema.name: openai_call_limit

inputs_schema.description: Enables commands to associate DevRev issues and GitHub PRs (/towards) and to automatically close DevRev issues when PRs are merged (/close).
inputs_schema.name: magic_commands

inputs_schema.description: Issues can directly be mentioned in PR body without using /towards or /close.
inputs_schema.name: mention_issue_directly_in_pr_body

ui.display_name: Mention issues in PR body without magic commands

inputs_schema.description: Closes autonomous issues when the source PR is merged.
inputs_schema.name: close_autonomous_on_merge

ui.display_name: Close autonomous issues when the PR is merged

inputs_schema.description: Changes the stage of the issue to In Development when a PR is closed or merged but the issue is mentioned without /close.
inputs_schema.name: set_issue_to_in_development_on_pr_close

ui.display_name: Update issue stage when the related PR is closed

inputs_schema.description: Updates the autonomous issue body and title with the PR body and title if the user hasn't already changed the title or hasn't deleted the automated part of the work item description.
inputs_schema.name: pr_body_update

ui.display_name: Update autonomous issue body with PR details

inputs_schema.description: Creates a dependency link between the issues mentioned in the PR body and the autonomous issues tagged with the branch/PR.
inputs_schema.name: pr_auto_link

ui.display_name: Link issues from PR body with autonomous issues

inputs_schema.description: Creates a task for the owner of an autonomous issue to update the issues.
inputs_schema.name: create_task_for_pr_reviews

inputs_schema.description: Sends reminders for stale PRs.
inputs_schema.name: pr_reminder

inputs_schema.description: Posts reminders on issue discussion for stale PRs after the specified number of days of inactivity.
inputs_schema.name: max_inactivity_days_pr_reminder

ui.display_name: Max days wait before sending inactive PR reminders

inputs_schema.description: The default part to create autonomous issues with (if part cannot be inferred from repository).
inputs_schema.name: autonomous_issue_default_part

ui.display_name: Default part to assign autonomous issues to

inputs_schema.description: Automate PR prefix-based tagging for related issues with tags including github.enhancement, github.feature, github.fix, github.chore, github.test, github.revert, github.refactor.
inputs_schema.name: add_pr_prefix_tag

ui.display_name: Automate PR prefix-based tagging for related issue

inputs_schema.description: Look for Jira issue pattern in PR branch name, body and description
inputs_schema.name: match_jira_issues

inputs_schema.description: Jira issue patterns
inputs_schema.name: jira_issues_patterns

inputs_schema.description: IDs of GitHub bots which merge the pull requests (in cases where PRs are queued for merging). These IDs will be replaced with PR author when writing to timeline of code_change objects.
inputs_schema.name: bot_actors

inputs_schema.name: issue_stage_on_branch_creation

ui.display_name: Update issue stage on branch creation

inputs_schema.description: Update issue stage on PR draft
inputs_schema.name: issue_stage_on_pr_draft

ui.display_name: Update issue stage on PR draft

inputs_schema.description: Update issue stage on PR open
inputs_schema.name: issue_stage_on_pr_open

ui.display_name: Update issue stage on PR open

name: GitHub

per_object_schema.description: Identify skills using PR changes and update the dev user with the identified skills.
per_object_schema.name: globals_identify_skills

per_object_schema.description: Categorize issues based on PR and issue details.
per_object_schema.name: globals_categorize_issues

per_object_schema.description: Store the summary of the Pull Request in the code_change object.
per_object_schema.name: globals_summarize_pull_request

per_object_schema.description: Post feedback request on issue categorization.
per_object_schema.name: globals_get_feedback_for_issue_categorization

ui.display_name: Post feedback request on issue categorization

per_object_schema.description: The number of calls to OpenAI API allowed per PR.
per_object_schema.name: globals_openai_call_limit

per_object_schema.description: Enables commands to associate DevRev issues and GitHub PRs (/towards) and to automatically close DevRev issues when PRs are merged (/close).
per_object_schema.name: globals_magic_commands

per_object_schema.description: Issues can directly be mentioned in PR body without using /towards or /close.
per_object_schema.name: globals_mention_issue_directly_in_pr_body

ui.display_name: Mention issues in PR body without magic commands

per_object_schema.description: Closes autonomous issues when the source PR is merged.
per_object_schema.name: globals_close_autonomous_on_merge

ui.display_name: Close autonomous issues when the PR is merged

per_object_schema.description: Changes the stage of the issue to In Development when a PR is closed or merged but the issue is mentioned without /close.
per_object_schema.name: globals_set_issue_to_in_development_on_pr_close

ui.display_name: Update issue stage when the related PR is closed

per_object_schema.description: Updates the autonomous issue body and title with the PR body and title if the user hasn't already changed the title or hasn't deleted the automated part of the work item description.
per_object_schema.name: globals_pr_body_update

ui.display_name: Update autonomous issue body with PR details

per_object_schema.description: Creates a dependency link between the issues mentioned in the PR body and the autonomous issues tagged with the branch/PR.
per_object_schema.name: globals_pr_auto_link

ui.display_name: Link issues from PR body with autonomous issues

per_object_schema.description: Creates a task for the owner of an autonomous issue to update the issues.
per_object_schema.name: globals_create_task_for_pr_reviews

per_object_schema.description: Sends reminders for stale PRs.
per_object_schema.name: globals_pr_reminder

per_object_schema.description: Posts reminders on issue discussion for stale PRs after the specified number of days of inactivity.
per_object_schema.name: globals_max_inactivity_days_pr_reminder

ui.display_name: Max days wait before sending inactive PR reminders

per_object_schema.description: The default part to create autonomous issues with (if part cannot be inferred from repository).
per_object_schema.name: globals_autonomous_issue_default_part

ui.display_name: Default part to assign autonomous issues to

per_object_schema.description: Automate PR prefix-based tagging for related issues with tags including github.enhancement, github.feature, github.fix, github.chore, github.test, github.revert, github.refactor.
per_object_schema.name: globals_add_pr_prefix_tag

ui.display_name: Automate PR prefix-based tagging for related issue

per_object_schema.description: Look for Jira issue pattern in PR branch name, body and description
per_object_schema.name: globals_match_jira_issues

per_object_schema.description: Jira issue patterns
per_object_schema.name: globals_jira_issues_patterns

per_object_schema.description: IDs of GitHub bots which merge the pull requests (in cases where PRs are queued for merging). These IDs will be replaced with PR author when writing to timeline of code_change objects.
per_object_schema.name: globals_bot_actors

custom_fields.obj__globals_auto_reply_message: Thank you for writing in, we will respond as soon as possible. While you wait, please add any additional information that may help us with your inquiry.

description: Talk to your customers over email directly from DevRev.

inputs.name: auto_reply_message
inputs.value: Thank you for writing in, we will respond as soon as possible. While you wait, please add any additional information that may help us with your inquiry.

inputs_schema.description: Enter email address in this format - "Maple Support <support@maplesoftware.net>" where "Maple Support" is the Name which appears in your customer's inbox.
inputs_schema.name: support_email

inputs_schema.description: Choose what DevRev should do from emails sent to the primary email address.
inputs_schema.name: primary_sync_object

inputs_schema.description: If enabled, all messages to the customer chat will be sent via email as well as to the source channel of the ticket.
inputs_schema.name: is_email_default_channel

ui.display_name: Set email as the default channel for tickets

inputs_schema.description: Enter additional support emails below to create Tickets on DevRev. Eg. Maple Help <help@maplesoftware.net>
inputs_schema.name: additional_support_emails

inputs_schema.description: Select the default part of your product (Required if tickets are created from the configured emails)
inputs_schema.name: default_part

inputs_schema.description: Select the default owner for tickets created from emails
inputs_schema.name: default_owner

inputs_schema.description: Enter additional support emails below to create Conversations on DevRev. Eg. Maple Sales <sales@maplesoftware.net>
inputs_schema.name: additional_conversation_emails

inputs_schema.description: If enabled, name of the logged-in user will be the sender name for outgoing emails
inputs_schema.name: use_commenter_name_in_from_address

ui.display_name: Use the name of the logged-in user as sender name

inputs_schema.description: This signature would be added to all emails sent from DevRev. If personalised email signature is present, this signature will be added only to emails that automations send.
inputs_schema.name: custom_email_signature

inputs_schema.description: If enabled, new account is created when the email domain does not map to an existing account. No accounts are created for common domains such as gmail.com, yahoo.com and others.
inputs_schema.name: identify_rev_org

inputs_schema.description: Turning this off will disable any other automation to send emails on your behalf
inputs_schema.name: enable_bot_replies_emails

inputs_schema.description: Choose who should be sent an auto-reply message when an email is received
inputs_schema.name: send_auto_replies_to

inputs_schema.default_value: Thank you for writing in, we will respond as soon as possible. While you wait, please add any additional information that may help us with your inquiry.
inputs_schema.description: This message will be sent to the user as a response to the first email
inputs_schema.name: auto_reply_message

inputs_schema.description: Capture the customer workspace and reported by details on the ticket from the forwarded emails, even if the customer is not a part of the email thread
inputs_schema.name: infer_users_from_email_body

ui.display_name: Capture customer details from forwarded emails

inputs_schema.description: Select users from the list below to receive notifications whenever an email is dropped or a person is marked as a spammer
inputs_schema.name: users_to_notify

inputs_schema.description: Specify the maximum number of emails a user can send within a 10-minute timeframe before being flagged as a spammer.
inputs_schema.name: email_spam_threshold

inputs_schema.description: Specify the maximum number of emails allowed within a 24-hour window for users marked as spammers.
inputs_schema.name: email_block_threshold

ui.display_name: Set Maximum Spam Emails per 24 Hours

inputs_schema.description: Choose the email address from which notifications will be sent to the customer
inputs_schema.name: notifications_from_address

inputs_schema.description: Specify the public URL for the organisation logo to be added to the notifications.
inputs_schema.name: notifications_org_logo_url

inputs_schema.description: Choose the email address from which CSAT surveys will be sent to the customer
inputs_schema.name: csat_from_address

inputs_values.auto_reply_message: Thank you for writing in, we will respond as soon as possible. While you wait, please add any additional information that may help us with your inquiry.
